tool_description: Validates transaction amounts against various limits, currency requirements, and business rules.

decimal_places.description: Maximum allowed decimal places for the currency

error_messages: Invalid amount: Transaction amount must be a positive number greater than 0.
Amount below minimum: Transaction amount is below the minimum allowed limit.
Amount exceeds maximum: Transaction amount exceeds the maximum allowed limit.
Invalid currency code: Currency must be a valid ISO 3-letter currency code (e.g., USD, EUR, GBP).
Invalid decimal precision: Amount has more decimal places than allowed for this currency.
usage: Provide the transaction amount and currency code. Optionally set minimum_amount, maximum_amount, and decimal_places constraints based on business rules.

is_valid.description: Whether the amount passes all validation checks

formatted_amount.description: Properly formatted amount string for the currency

validation_errors.description: List of validation errors if any
